dict.acceptation: 唯一的，仅有的；独一无二的，独特的；不平常的，特别的；超绝；

sent.orig: All rare and unique items were scanned for duplicates.
sent.trans: 答：所有rare,unique的装备将被检查是否被复制过。

sent.orig: All Unique dolls are made only one in the world.
sent.trans: 所有的Unique版本的娃娃，全世界只有一个。

sent.orig: This is a unique event. A unique opportunity. And therefore a unique responsibility.
sent.trans: 这是一件极不平凡的大事，一个非同寻常的机会，同时也负有独特的责任。

sent.orig: China a unique landscape a unique set of circumstances.
sent.trans: 中国是个独特的地方，有著独特的环境状况。

sent.orig: China's economic structure is unique to the freight forwarding and logistics market in unique investment opportunities.
sent.trans: 中国独特的经济形态给了货代和物流市场独特的投资机会。
